name: Fugitive 54-57
description:
Overview

Fugitive 54-57 is on the run after escaping from his cell in the Intergalactic Space Prison. The UISP (Unified Intergalactic Space Police) are on the case and it is your job to help the fugitive make his escape!

Fugitive 54-57 is a platforming runner game where you have to dodge obstacles and shoot enemies through three levels. It is a single-player game with online high scores.
